p.p:
A subset of SNOMED CT intended for use in the UK, a set of concepts, which represent the telehealth encounter disposition.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK TelehealthDispositionSnCT subset with subset original id 45341000000138.
The use of this subset is Advisory.
For further information on the use of SNOMED CT subsets in messaging please refer to the “Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains” document located under the Associated Specifications tab.

concept.displayName: Assessed as not suitable for case management
